about.summary: Ignition CMake : CMake Modules for Ignition Projects

name: libignition-cmake0
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set base_name = "libignition-cmake" %}
{% set version = "0.6.1" %}
{% set name = base_name + version.split('.')[0] %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  - url: https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/get/ignition-cmake_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: d5409b66b4c05087d744eb60cd5c9ce3792541d071e4f40951c2e5c501874956

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win and vc<14]
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage(name, max_pin='x.x') }}

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('c') }}                # [not win]
    - vs2017_win-64                      # [win64]
    - vs2017_win-32                      # [win32]
    - make                               # [not win]
    - cmake

test:
  commands:
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake0/ignition-cmake0-config.cmake  # [not win]
    - if exist %PREFIX%\\Library\\lib\\cmake\\ignition-cmake0\\ignition-cmake0-config.cmake (exit 0) else (exit 1)  # [win]

about:
  home: https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Ignition CMake : CMake Modules for Ignition Projects'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - seanyen
    - wolfv
    - traversaro
    - j-rivero
